title: Part I: Soprano Pitches (8 points)
stimulusHtml:
A. Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration. (An accidental placed after the notehead is not considered correct notation.)

B. Octave transpositions of soprano pitches are not allowed.

C. No enharmonic equivalents are allowed.

title: Part II: Bass Pitches (8 points)
stimulusHtml:
A. Award 1 point for each correctly notated pitch. Do not consider duration. (An accidental placed after the notehead is not considered correct notation.)

B. Award full credit for octave transpositions of the correct bass pitch.

C. No enharmonic equivalents are allowed.

title: Part III: Chord Symbols (8 points)
stimulusHtml:
A. Award 1 point for each chord symbol correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

B. Award ½ point for each correct Roman numeral that has incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

C. Accept the correct Roman numeral regardless of its case.

D. Award no credit if an accidental is placed before a Roman numeral.

E. The cadential six-four may be correctly labeled as shown below. Also, give full credit for the labels “Cad ^4 ” or “C ^4 ” for the first chord in measure 3. If the Roman numeral of the first chord in measure 3 is V, the space below the second chord in measure 3 should contain a figure, a dash, or a V for the first chord to receive any credit. If the space below the second chord in measure 3 is blank, no credit for chord symbol is awarded for either the first or second chord in that measure.

F. Half-point totals round up.
descriptions: No chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

One chord symbol is correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

No chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; one or two chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

Two chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

One chord symbol is correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; one or two chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

OR

No chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; three or four chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

Three chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

At least one chord symbol is correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; one or more chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

OR

No chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; five or six chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

Four chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

At least one chord symbol is correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; one or more chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

OR

No chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; seven or eight chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

Five chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

At least one chord symbol is correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; some or all remaining chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

Six chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

At least three chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; some or all remaining chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

Seven chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

At least five chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; some or all remaining chord symbols have the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.

Eight chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals.

OR

Seven chord symbols are correct in both Roman and Arabic numerals; one chord symbol has the correct Roman numeral but incorrect or missing Arabic numerals.
